messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm Off Tomorrow
messages.msgSnippet: Take care Tia!! ~Elissa Cleaveland An unlesson d girl, unschool d, unpractic d; Happy in this, she is not so old But she may learn. W.S. The Merchant of Venice
messages.messageBody:
Take care Tia!!
~Elissa Cleaveland
An unlesson'd girl, unschool'd, unpractic'd;
Happy in this, she is not so old
But she may learn.
W.S. The Merchant of Venice III, ii, 160

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm Off Tomorrow
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/3/02 11:08:25 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Oh, Tia, this is so hard. I remember doing this with my Grandma. I will be thinking of you
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/3/02 11:08:25 PM Central Daylight Time,
leschke@... writes:


> Lars and I are leaving in the morning for a week at my mother's. It will
> be the last visit in her apartment, as we're moving her into a nursing home
> while we're there. Luckily, she's ready.
>
> I'll check in once or twice at the library, but otherwise I'll be in
> withdrawal. <g>
> Tia

Oh, Tia, this is so hard. I remember doing this with my Grandma. I will be
thinking of you this week. Good luck and enjoy this time with your Mother.
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: I'm Off Tomorrow
messages.msgSnippet: Lars and I are leaving in the morning for a week at my mother s.  It will be the last visit in her apartment, as we re moving her into a nursing home while
messages.messageBody:
Lars and I are leaving in the morning for a week at my mother's. It will
be the last visit in her apartment, as we're moving her into a nursing home
while we're there. Luckily, she's ready.

I'll check in once or twice at the library, but otherwise I'll be in
withdrawal. <g>
Tia

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island
